Class BusAndChauffeur

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tour
      • BusAndChauffeur
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class BusAndChauffeur
extends Tour
    A class extending a Tour and representing a bus-and-chauffeur tour

    0.3, 12/12/2016
    Author:
    Krystof Spiller

    • Constructor Detail

      • BusAndChauffeur

        public BusAndChauffeur(Chauffeur chauffeur,
                       Bus bus,
                       Schedule schedule,
                       boolean food)
        Four-argument constructor. Constructor from the super class Tour is called. Booleans representing availability of breakfast, lunch, dinner and request for party bus and party guide are set to false.
        Parameters:
        chauffeur - an object of type Chauffeur
        bus - an object of type Bus
        schedule - an object of type Schedule
        food - an object of type boolean
